about_the_game:
※This content requires the base game (sold separately) in order to play. Please also ensure that your base game software is updated to the most recent patch.

Description:
A special unit that hearkens back to an older title in the series, this special Dwarf is straight out of Class of Heroes 3. They come equipped with a Greataxe, Academy Uniform, and Leather Shoes which are otherwise unobtainable. This Dwarf is no stronger and no weaker than any of the other Dwarves that can be recruited in the game.
